properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM COMMUNITY

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT COMMUNITY_NO, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY, COMMUNITY_TITLE, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(COMMUNITY_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "COMMUNITY_DATE", COMMUNITY_VIEWS, COMMUNITY_GOOD FROM COMMUNITY B JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_ID) ORDER BY COMMUNITY_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO COMMUNITY( COMMUNITY_NO, MEMBER_ID, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY, COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_DETAIL, COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_VIEWS, COMMUNITY_GOOD, COMMUNITY_BAD ) VALUES( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0 )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT_COMMUNITY( FILE_NO, REF_CNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, UPLOAD_DATE ) VALUES( SEQ_ACNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_CNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE )
